channel.title: How do you run a 508 server?
channel.description:
i started java lately and i began here and i have to wonder how exactly you run the server when the run.cmd always says this:
The system cannot find the path specified: press any key to continue.
i put the file in any place possible i can think of and it still gets the same message.
any ideas on how to run a 508 server?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 02, 2008, 04:17:52 pm[/size][hr]oh i downloaded the blazescape, i wanted to edit everythig myself and learn but i cant becuz i cant get it to run

item.title: How do you run a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @llaver llaver
item.description:
@llaver wrote:

well im trying to run a 508 to. i can run the server part and all but i dont know how to get a client for my server because whenever i use the client that i downloaded on the download page of the server download (i also downloaded the server there but it didnt work with my server it went on his unstead of mine how do i get it so it runs my server on the client any help?

Read full topic
item.source: How do you run a 508 server?

item.title: How do you run a 508 server?
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Fix your PATH variable, there are tutorials on it. Please use the search feature, its there for a reason!
If you can’t even search you won’t get far.

agf1.jpg764×527

Read full topic
